enrolled-dateline.#text: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen

congress.#text: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America

official-title.#text: To take certain Federal lands located in El Dorado County, California, into trust for the benefit of the Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians, and for other purposes.

role.#text: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.

header.#text: Land into Trust for the Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians

text.#text: The land described in subsection (b) is hereby taken into trust for the benefit of the Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians, subject to valid existing rights and management agreements related to easements and rights-of-way.

term.#tail: and dated June 7, 2012, including improvements and appurtenances thereto.

text.#text: The land taken into trust pursuant to subsection (a) is the approximately 40.852 acres of Federal land under the administrative jurisdiction of the
Class II and class III gaming under the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall not be permitted at any time on the land taken into trust pursuant to subsection (a).

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: HR 2388 ENR: To take certain Federal lands located in El Dorado County, California, into trust for the benefit of the Shingle Springs Band of Miwok Indians, and for other purposes.
